member.summary: Get or set the minutes between attempts when the previous attempt was busy. Up to 8 numbers are allowed.

member.name: P:StatNeth.Blaise.API.Cati.Specification.ITimeSlice.Days
member.summary: Get or set the days to which the time slice applies. String of length 7 consisting of 0s and 1s where the first character represents Sundays, and a 1 means applicable for that day. E.g. 0111110 means applicable for Mondays, Tuesdays, Wednesdays, Thursdays and Fridays.

member.summary: Get or set the maximum number of tries allowed for this time slice.

member.summary: Get or set if the time slice applies to Sundays

member.summary: Removes all items from the collection.

member.summary: Removes a ITimeSliceSet from the collection.

member.name: M:StatNeth.Blaise.API.Cati.Specification.ITimeSliceSetCollection.RemoveAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the ITimeSliceSet item at the specified index. Throws an argument out of range exception if invalid index.
member.param: Index of item to remove.
member.returns: True if item was removed, False otherwise.

members.member:
Adds a new time slice set with the specified code, name, forFirstCall and sameDay settings.
The time slice set code. The time slice set name. If the time slice set should be for the first call. If the time slice set should allow calls on the same day. /// An ITimeSliceSet.
